metadata.description: Accurate API model IDs, pricing, and specs for 64 AI models across 11 providers. Prevents your coding agent from using outdated or hallucinated model names.

plugins.name: model-id-cheatsheet
plugins.description: Gives Claude instant access to accurate API model IDs, pricing, and specs for 64 models across 11 providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, xAI, Meta, Mistral, DeepSeek, Amazon, Cohere, Perplexity, AI21). Auto-updated daily.
